bug.short_desc: Readability of the bind method's documentation in SingleValueBinding

long_desc.thetext:
The "bind" method of the SingleValueBinding stands in the heart of the entire data binding framework in qooxdoo, and all the documentation regarding the possible binding options refers to the API documentation of this method [1], however, it seems to me that this documentation is not very readable and lacks some explanations, especially about the binding options. Instead of describing the parameters which are passed to the converter, onUpdate and onSetFail in words (the first parameter is, the second is and so on...) perhaps a signature of these methods could be provided, along with a short code example.
Perhaps it is personal taste, but it seems to me to be too dense and it is hard to find the parameters at a glance.
[1] http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/apiviewer/#qx.data.SingleValueBinding

Updated the docs of the bind method.
